title: Gluten free broccoli quiche
ingredients: ['Base', '325g grated carrots, patted dry to remove excess liquid', '4 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '40g diced onion', '1 teaspoon herbal salt, or to taste', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons cold water', '2 tablespoons cornflour', 'Filling', '2 small heads broccoli, finely chopped', '3 eggs', '120g pesto sauce', '1 teaspoon herbal salt, or to taste', 'Topping', '20g grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
